evaluate.js: () => { const toItem = a => ({ title: (a.textContent||'').trim(), href: a.href }); const anchors = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('a.result-header, a[href^="http"]')); const items = anchors.map(toItem).filter(x => x.href.includes('httpbin.org')); const seen = new Set(); return items.filter(x => { if(seen.has(x.href)) return false; seen.add(x.href); return true; }).slice(0,10); }
